test_cases.objective: Verify that custom calculations for impurity calculations and RRF adjustments work as intended.

test_steps.action: Load a sample chromatogram with known impurity peaks.
test_steps.expected_result: Chromatogram loads successfully with visible peaks.

test_steps.action: Apply custom impurity calculation formula.
test_steps.expected_result: System calculates impurity percentages correctly.

test_steps.action: Apply proprietary RRF adjustment to the same data.
test_steps.expected_result: System adjusts peak areas according to defined RRF values.

acceptance_criteria: Custom calculations match manual calculations within ±2%
RRF adjustments are applied correctly
data_integrity_requirements: Audit trail records all calculation steps
No unauthorized modifications possible

test_cases.objective: Verify system can simultaneously acquire data from 8 instruments without performance degradation.

test_steps.action: Initiate simultaneous runs on all 8 instruments.
test_steps.expected_result: System accepts start commands for all instruments.

test_steps.action: Monitor system performance during acquisition.
test_steps.expected_result: All instruments show active acquisition status.

test_steps.action: Verify all runs complete successfully.
test_steps.expected_result: 8 complete data sets are stored with correct metadata.

acceptance_criteria: All 8 runs complete within expected timeframes
No data loss occurs
System resources remain within 80% capacity
data_integrity_requirements: Complete run metadata recorded
No data corruption during transfer

test_cases.test_name: Custom Calculation Verification for Non-Standard Impurities
test_cases.objective: Verify that the CDS correctly executes custom calculations for non-standard impurity determinations as configured in the vendor's formula editor.
prerequisites: Test method with custom impurity calculations loaded
Sample data set with known impurity values

test_steps.action: Load the test method containing custom impurity calculations into the CDS.
test_steps.expected_result: Method loads successfully with all custom formulas intact.

test_steps.action: Process the sample data set through the method.
test_steps.expected_result: System processes data without errors and displays calculated impurity values.

test_steps.action: Compare calculated impurity values against known values.
test_steps.expected_result: Calculated values match expected values within acceptable tolerance.

acceptance_criteria: All custom calculations execute without errors
Calculated values match expected values within ±5%
Processing completes within 60 seconds as specified in URS-CDS-014
regulatory_basis: ICH Q2(R1) for analytical procedure validation
data_integrity_requirements: Audit trail records all calculation steps
Original data remains unaltered

test_cases.objective: Verify the CDS can simultaneously acquire data from multiple instruments without performance degradation.
prerequisites: Test methods loaded on all instruments

test_steps.action: Initiate acquisition on all connected instruments simultaneously.
test_steps.expected_result: System accepts start commands for all instruments.

test_steps.action: Monitor system performance during concurrent acquisition.
test_steps.expected_result: No system crashes or freezes occur during acquisition.

test_steps.action: Verify all acquired data files are complete and uncorrupted.
test_steps.expected_result: All runs complete with valid data files and audit trail entries.

acceptance_criteria: System supports simultaneous acquisition from all connected instruments
No data loss or corruption occurs during concurrent operation
System resources remain within vendor-specified limits
regulatory_basis: 21 CFR Part 11 for complete data capture
GMP requirements for instrument control systems
data_integrity_requirements: All acquired data must be complete and traceable
Audit trail records all acquisition events

test_cases.objective: Verify that custom calculation routines execute within the specified time frame of 60 seconds as per URS-CDS-014.

test_steps.action: Initiate custom calculation routine on sample data
test_steps.expected_result: Calculation completes within 60 seconds

acceptance_criteria: Custom calculation completes within 60 seconds
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure calculation results are accurate and reproducible

test_cases.objective: Validate the generation of custom reports using the vendor's report designer as per URS-CDS-005.
prerequisites: System configured with custom report templates

test_steps.action: Generate a custom report using the report designer
test_steps.expected_result: Report is generated correctly with all specified fields

acceptance_criteria: Custom report is generated correctly with all specified fields
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure report data is accurate and complete

test_cases.objective: Verify that custom calculation routines execute within the specified time frame of 60 seconds.

test_steps.action: Load a chromatographic data set with custom calculations.
test_steps.expected_result: Data set loads successfully.

test_steps.action: Execute the custom calculation routine.
test_steps.expected_result: Calculation completes within 60 seconds.

data_integrity_requirements: Ensure no data modification during calculation.

test_cases.objective: Verify that custom reports can be generated using the vendor's report designer.

test_steps.action: Select a chromatographic data set.
test_steps.expected_result: Data set is selected successfully.

test_steps.action: Generate a custom report using the configured template.
test_steps.expected_result: Report is generated successfully with all required fields.

acceptance_criteria: Custom reports are generated correctly with all required fields.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure report data integrity.

test_cases.objective: Verify the system's ability to generate custom reports using the vendor's report designer as specified in URS-CDS-005.
prerequisites: Access to vendor's report designer tool

test_steps.action: Launch the CDS software and navigate to the report designer module.
test_steps.expected_result: Report designer module opens successfully with all features accessible.

test_steps.action: Create a custom report template including sample ID, peak area, and custom calculations.
test_steps.expected_result: Report template is created without errors and saved in the system.

test_steps.action: Generate a report using the custom template and sample data.
test_steps.expected_result: Report is generated correctly with all specified fields populated accurately.

acceptance_criteria: Custom report template can be created and saved successfully.
Generated report includes all specified fields and calculations accurately.
regulatory_basis: 21 CFR Part 11 compliance for electronic records
data_integrity_requirements: Report data must be accurate and unaltered from original chromatographic data.
Audit trail must record all changes to report templates.

test_cases.test_name: Custom Export Routine Validation for LIMS Interface
test_cases.objective: Validate the custom export routines for data transfer to LIMS as specified in URS-CDS-007 and URS-CDS-019.

test_steps.action: Configure a custom export routine in CDS to export data in XML format for LIMS.
test_steps.expected_result: Export routine is configured without errors and saved in the system.

test_steps.action: Execute the export routine using sample chromatographic data.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is exported successfully in the specified XML format.

test_steps.action: Verify the exported data in LIMS for accuracy and completeness.
test_steps.expected_result: Data in LIMS matches the original chromatographic data without discrepancies.

acceptance_criteria: Custom export routine can be configured and executed successfully.
Exported data in XML format is accurate and complete when viewed in LIMS.
regulatory_basis: 21 CFR Part 11 compliance for electronic data transfer
GMP requirements for data integrity during system interfaces
data_integrity_requirements: Exported data must be identical to original chromatographic data.
Audit trail must record all export activities.

test_cases.objective: Verify that custom calculation routines execute within the specified time frame of 60 seconds as per URS-CDS-014.

test_steps.action: Load sample chromatographic data into the CDS.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is successfully loaded and ready for processing.

test_steps.action: Execute the custom calculation routine.
test_steps.expected_result: Calculation completes within 60 seconds.

acceptance_criteria: Custom calculation routine executes within 60 seconds
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure no data corruption during calculation

test_cases.objective: Validate the functionality of custom report generation using the vendor's report designer as per URS-CDS-005.

test_steps.action: Load sample chromatographic data into the CDS.

test_cases.objective: Verify that the CDS can generate custom reports using the vendor's report designer as specified in URS-CDS-005.

test_steps.action: Open the report designer tool in the CDS software.
test_steps.expected_result: Report designer tool opens successfully.

test_steps.action: Create a custom report template with non-standard fields and calculations.
test_steps.expected_result: Custom report template is created without errors.

test_steps.action: Generate a report using the custom template and sample data.
test_steps.expected_result: Report is generated with all specified fields and calculations.

acceptance_criteria: Custom report template can be created and saved.
Generated report includes all specified fields and calculations accurately.
data_integrity_requirements: Report data must be accurate and unaltered.

test_cases.objective: Verify that the CDS can export data to LIMS using the standard XML format as specified in URS-CDS-019.

test_steps.action: Configure the CDS to export data to LIMS in XML format.
test_steps.expected_result: Export configuration is saved successfully.

test_steps.action: Execute the export routine with sample data.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is exported to LIMS without errors.

test_steps.action: Verify the exported data in LIMS for accuracy and completeness.
test_steps.expected_result: Exported data matches the source data in CDS.

acceptance_criteria: Data export configuration can be saved and executed.
Exported data in LIMS matches the source data in CDS.
data_integrity_requirements: Exported data must be accurate and unaltered.

test_cases.objective: Verify that custom calculation routines execute within the specified time frame of 60 seconds as per URS-CDS-014.

test_steps.action: Load the test data set into the CDS software.
test_steps.expected_result: Test data set is successfully loaded.

test_steps.action: Execute the custom calculation routine.
test_steps.expected_result: Custom calculation routine completes execution.

test_steps.action: Calculate the total execution time.
test_steps.expected_result: Total execution time is within 60 seconds.

acceptance_criteria: Custom calculation routine executes within 60 seconds.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure accurate timing data capture
